00013 bool StopFilter::analyze(const TermList& input, TermList& output){
00014         TermList::const_iterator it = input.begin();
00015         for(; it != input.end(); it ++){
00016                 if(stopDic_.find(it->text) == stopDic_.end())
00017                         output.push_back(*it);
00018         }
00019         return true;
00020 }
00021 
00022 bool StopFilter::analyze(TermList& InOutPut){
00023         TermList::iterator it = InOutPut.begin();
00024         for(; it != InOutPut.end(); ){
00025                 if(stopDic_.find(it->text) != stopDic_.end())
00026                         it = InOutPut.erase(it);
00027                 else
00028                         it ++;
00029         }
00030         return true;
00031 }
